Jun 26, 2002

Russia approves land sales bill

> “Most of Russia’s farmland is still owned by the state The lower house of the Russian parliament has approved the sale of farmland across Russia, for the first time since the 1917 Bolshevik revolution.” (BBC)

Afghan king’s wife dies in Rome

> “The wife of Afghan king Zahir Shah has died in Rome only a few weeks before she was to return to her homeland to be reunited with her husband. > > > Homaira Shah, 84-years-old, died two days after being admitted to hospital with breathing problems and heart trouble.” > BBC
